channel.title: Devens Edited Creativescape [ACTUALLY WORKS]
channel.description:
[ul][list]So as some of you may know I was going to edit and advance creativescape but I'm done because I realized this server is EXTREMELY boring so here is my edits.... It will help and is better than the original download....
[size=12pt][b]MY EDITS[/b][/size] [list] [li]::home added[/li] [li]::castlewars added[/li] [li]::fightpits added[/li] [li]::jad[/li] [li]::duel[/li] [li] Fixed ::master[/li] [li] Fixed ::pickup[/li] [li] Added ::pestcontrol[/li] [li] Added a New Home[/li] [li] Fixed Client So It Works To Connect[/li] [li] Fixed Auto Cache Downloader[/li] [/list] This has a little baby anti-leech just to prevent complete morons from using it... [size=24pt]IF ANYONE POSTS ANSWERS LINKS WILL BE REMOVED[/size] Server - https://dl.dropbox.com/u/42859669/Deven%27s%20Creativescape.rar Client - https://dl.dropbox.com/u/42859669/Devens%20Creativescape%20Client.rar Cache - https://dl.dropbox.com/u/42859669/cache.rar
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [li]Full Castle Wars[/li] [li]Full Fight Pits[/li] [li]Full Duel Arena[/li] [li]Full Thieving[/li] [li]Fully Working Melee[/li] [li]Fully Working Magic[/li] [li]Fully Working Range[/li] [li]12 Completed Quests[/li] [li]90% Prayer Working[/li] [li]Fully Working Pest Control[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [/list] [b]Latest updates:[/b] [list] [li]::home added[/li] [li]::castlewars added[/li] [li]::fightpits added[/li] [li]::jad[/li] [li]::duel[/li] [/list]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20060904214339/runescape/images/archive/5/5c/20100607202120!Minigame_icon.png[/img] [b]Minigames[/b]

item.title: Devens Edited Creativescape [ACTUALLY WORKS]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

JavaTC:

I don’t even remember anything wrong with the original.

I don’t remember anything either.

On Topic: Post a detailed Developmental Log about what you’ve done. This will help you to avoid negative comments and bring in the positive ones. Placing a few anti-leeches in a Base is understandable, but you should be encouraging people to use this instead of limiting them to what we have (Project Insanity, Trisidia X, etc).

Read full topic
